name: Subhuman
description:
Game made for GJL Game Parade Summer 2021.

The H.T.V. Coelacanth sunk recently under mysterious circumstances. We have only enough air for one last dive, now that we've located the black box aboard the ship. You have one shot at this. Dive down, destroy the evidence.

Controls:

WASD - Swim up, left, down, and right, respectively.

Spacebar - Turn flashlight on and off.

Click - Throw flare.

E - Interact
